title: Sukarjo Wiryopranoto
text:
Soekardjo Wirjopranoto (June 5, 1903 - October 23, 1962) was an <a href="Indonesia">Indonesian</a> freedom fighter and <a href="National%20Hero%20of%20Indonesia">National Hero of Indonesia</a>.
In 1923, he was a graduate of the Law School in the <a href="District%20Court">District Court</a>. Then, he worked in several cities until finally set up his own <a href="Lawyer">law</a> office "Vishnu" in <a href="Malang">Malang</a>, <a href="East%20Java">East Java</a>.
Sukardjo become a member of the <a href="Volksraad%20%28Dutch%20East%20Indies%29">Volksraad</a> in 1931. Additionally with <a href="Soetomo%20%28doctor%29">Dr. Sutomo</a> founded the <a href="National%20Association%20of%20Indonesia">National Association of Indonesia</a>.
He also served as Indonesia's Permanent Representative at the <a href="United%20Nations">United Nations</a> (UN) until the end.
He was buried in <a href="Kalibata%20Heroes%20Cemetery">Kalibata Heroes Cemetery</a>, <a href="Jakarta">Jakarta</a>.
